u-search-input/load-list.description: Search list return function, accept search keywords as parameters, return value in promise or array

u-search-input/value-check.description: Search and value are synchronized when out of focus, only effective when value is bound

u-search-input/type.description: The input box type currently supports two types: `'text'` and `'password'`

u-search-input/clearable.description: Whether it can be cleared. Turn it on and the clear button will be displayed when the input box has content.

u-search-input/size.description: Size extension, supports one value: `'mini'`, `'small'`, `'normal'`, `'large'`, `'huge'`, `'full'`, or two A combination of values, the former represents height, and the latter represents width, similar to the CSS padding writing format.

u-search-input/search.description: Search mark, supports position customization, the default search mark is on the far right, the value of `left` means the search mark is on the left

u-search-input/maxlength-message.description: Error prompt when the input content reaches the upper limit, and takes effect when wrapped by [FormItem](#/components/u-form)
